item.title: African Masks Warp in These Hand-Drawn GIFs | The Creators Project
item.description:
African Masks Warp in These Hand-Drawn GIFs | The Creators Project

Images courtesy the artist A series of hand-drawn African masks by Brooklyn artist Matthias Brown, a.k.a., Traceloops transforms in a series of seamless GIFs as addicting to watch as the Domino's Pizza Tracker in winter (read: very addicting).

item.title: Why a bunch of Silicon Valley investors are suddenly interested in universal basic income
item.description:
Why a bunch of Silicon Valley investors are suddenly interested in universal basic income

Basic income is having a moment. First Finland announced it would launch an ambitious experiment to see if it would work to give everyone in a given area is given a set amount of cash every year from the government, no strings attached.

item.title: Scientists find evidence of mathematical structures in classic books
item.description:
Scientists find evidence of mathematical structures in classic books

James Joyce's Finnegans Wake has been described as many things, from a masterpiece to unreadable nonsense. But it is also, according to scientists at the Institute of Nuclear Physics in Poland, almost indistinguishable in its structure from a purely mathematical multifractal.

item.title: Dreams of Dal√≠, a new VR experience, takes you inside a surrealist desertscape dreamland.
item.description:
Dreams of Dal√≠, a new VR experience, takes you inside a surrealist desertscape dreamland.

When you first parachute into the virtual reality landscape of Dreams of Dal√≠, you find yourself in a vast desert, staring up at two impossibly tall statues-an amorphous man and woman, heads bowed in prayer.
